member.name: P:IPServiceAggregator.DTO.ServiceInput.Services
member.summary: comma separated services ex - geoip,rdap. If kept blank default list will be considered.

member.name: M:IPServiceAggregator.IPController.GetAsync(IPServiceAggregator.DTO.ServiceInput)
member.summary: Calls various services for the IP given. Supported services are - geoip and rdap
